title: Calories in Pizza with Pepperoni
meta_description: Discover calories in pizza with pepperoni per slice, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better meal planning.
assumptions: Standard 14-inch pizza, one slice (1/8th), hand-tossed crust, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni slices; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pizza size, crust type, brand, topping amounts, and preparation; check labels or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One slice of pepperoni pizza has about 290 kcal, with 12 g protein and 35 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add extra cheese (1 oz per slice)

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of pizza with pepperoni?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros for pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Per slice: 35 g carbs, 12 g protein, 12 g fat.

faqs.q: Is pepperoni pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 700 mg per slice due to cheese and cured meat.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in pizza with pepperoni?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~50 kcal per slice; deep dish adds ~100 kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in a whole pizza with pepperoni?
faqs.a: For an 8-slice pizza, total ~2320 kcal; varies by size.
